## CustomizableFieldValue interface

CustomizableFieldValue defines the price and sku of a product whose page contains a customized text field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CustomizableFieldValue 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [max\_characters?](./magento-api.customizablefieldvalue.max_characters.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The maximum number of characters that can be entered for this customizable option. |
|  [price\_type?](./magento-api.customizablefieldvalue.price_type.md) | Maybe&lt;[PriceTypeEnum](./magento-api.pricetypeenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> FIXED, PERCENT, or DYNAMIC. |
|  [price?](./magento-api.customizablefieldvalue.price.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The price of the custom value. |
|  [sku?](./magento-api.customizablefieldvalue.sku.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The Stock Keeping Unit for this option. |
|  [uid](./magento-api.customizablefieldvalue.uid.md) | Scalars\['ID'\] | The unique ID for a <code>CustomizableFieldValue</code> object. |
